column1: Table 18. Supplemental data for state governments
Series title:  Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts 2008 -Final, NCJ 237912
Data source:  Criminal Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts Program (CJEE)
Table 18. Supplemental data for state governments
Note:  "Estimated population" represents resident U.S. population (50 states excluding the District of Columbia) from the Bureau of the Census, Current Population Reports, July 2009.
a/ "Personal income" is from the U.S. Department of Commerce, Survey of Current Business, August 2008.
b/ "Total general expenditure" excludes utilities, state-operated liquor stores, and insurance trust benefits.
c/ "General functions only" FTE excludes utilities, and state-operated liquor stores.
